Summary: Fireball and cone-like lights over a deer feeder
divs: sighting detailsi have a deer feeder about 20 yards behind my patio. i also have a motion detector deer camera. i noticed the following two pictures spaced 16 seconds apart on the camera on 5\18\10. the first appears to be some type of fireball\flash that totall engulfed the feeder even though there was no bad weather that night. above the fireball are the points of what appear to be two slender lights spaced approximately 20 feet or so apart as if they were being projected down from above. the second picture taken at 3:46 a.m. appears to have the fireball rising above the feeder and the two slender lights moving almost totally above and out of the picture...again as if ascending upward. i am familiar with ufos to a certain degree and this probably doesn't qualify as a ufo event, but it is a very mysterious thing to me. i am happy to visit with anyone if they want to visit further about these attached pictures.
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Broken Arrow
